attributes.action: Tougher Sentencing on people who stab or wound Emergency Service or Key Workers
attributes.additional_details:
I was shocked and horrified to hear of a male who stabbed a police officer in the chest was only sentenced to 2 1/2 years in prison, He was sentenced to two years’ imprisonment for Section 20 wounding and six months imprisonment for having a bladed article. The sentences will be served consecutively. 

https://emergency-services.news/male-who-stabbed-police-officer-in-the-chest-is-jailed-for-2-5-years/


This is not a strict sentence and does not deter people from carrying knives and we are seeing an increase of this in the capital with gangs.
attributes.background: We need stricter Sentences for people that Stab or wound anyone who is a key worker or an emergency service member, 18 months is not acceptable

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Harsher sentencing for assaults' on police, emergency workers & prison officers.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549077

Introduce minimum sentences for attacks on emergency workers.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549032
